StandardFlux¶

class aspired.aspired.StandardFlux(target, group, cutoff=0.4, ftype='flux', silence=False)[source]¶
_lookup_standard()[source]¶

Check if the requested standard and library exist.

inspect_standard(renderer='default', jsonstring=False)[source]¶
load_standard(display=False, renderer='default', jsonstring=False)[source]¶

Read the standard flux/magnitude file. And return the wavelength and flux/mag in units of

wavelength: A flux: ergs / cm / cm / s / A mag: mag (AB)

display: tuple, optional

Set to True to display disgnostic plot.

renderer: string, optional

plotly renderer options.

jsonstring: tuple, optional

set to True to return json string that can be rendered by Plotly in any support language.
